name: VIScon Hackathon
description:
VIScon

### **Hackathon at VIScon: Build. Learn. Win. All in 42 Hours!**

Hey there, Code Warriors!

Want to prove your coding skills, meet new people, and have a blast‚Äîall while building something awesome? Join us for an adrenaline-pumping hackathon during VIScon, where the sky's the limit!

üìÖ **Event Dates**: 10.-12. October  
üïí **Duration**: 42 Hours  
üìç **Location**: ETH HG Library  
üí° **Theme**: Building Web Apps (Ideas Provided)  
üë• **Team Formation**: At the Event!

#### **Why You Should Jump In**

* **Mentorship**: Seasoned professionals are here to guide you.
* **Networking**: Meet like-minded students and future collaborators.
* **Prizes**: An attractive pool of prizes up for grabs.
* **Skill-Building**: This is your sandbox for rapid learning and innovation.
* **Free Food & Drinks**: Stay fueled and focused‚Äîon us!

#### **How It Rolls**

1. **Individual Sign-Up**: Register as an individual before 03.10.25.
2. **Team Up**: At the start of the event, form teams of 5-6. Come with friends or make new ones!
3. **Pick an Idea**: We'll provide a range of web app ideas‚Äîfrom fun to incredibly useful for ETH students.
4. **Hack, Build, Learn**: You've got 42 hours. Use them wisely!
5. **Pitch & Impress**: Present your masterpiece to our panel of judges.

You can find all further information on our [website](https://viscon.ethz.ch/2025/hackathon).

The [VSETH General Privacy Policy](https://account.vseth.ethz.ch/privacy) applies to this event.

### The fine print

* By participating you agree that pictures and videos can be taken of you that could be used for VIS-Purposes (VISIONEN, Instagram, etc)
* By participating, you agree to adhere by the [VIS Code of Conduct](https://cdn.vis.ethz.ch/code-of-conduct)
* Every participant is responsible for their own insurance
* All statements are made without guarantee
* In general, there are no refunds

| Cost VIS members |
| --- |
| 20.0 |

#### Event organisers

**Main event organiser** [Andri Florin](mailto:florina@ethz.ch)

##### Co-organisers

* [Hannes Eberhard](mailto:heberhard@ethz.ch)
* [Niklas Tischler](mailto:ntischler@ethz.ch)

name: Heimwoche
description:
Calm & Culture Events

Get ready for Heimwoche: A week-long sleepover!

## What is a "Heimwoche"?

The idea is that we rent a House relatively near ETH. In the evenings, dinner will be provided by VIS, along with an evening program that changes daily.
During the day, however, it is intended for you to go to ETH and go about your regular day, and only return for the evening. You will sleep in the house. So you don‚Äòt have to neglect your studies to join this event!
It is also possible to join just for the dinner and evening program. You can sign up for this [here](https://vis.ethz.ch/en/events/951/).

## Daily Program

* 06:30 - 08:30 Breakfast
* 10:00 - 16:00 House closed, go to ETH
* 19:00 - 20:30 Dinner
* 21:00 - Evening Program

## Weekly Evening Themes

* Monday: Board Game Night
* Tuesday: Movie Night
* Wednesday: Crepe & Video Game Night
* Thursday: Party Night

## Weekly Dinner Plan

* Monday: Pasta Night
* Tuesday: Chili Night
* Wednesday: Chicken (or Planted) Cacciatore with Mashed Potatoes
* Thursday: Thai Curry

## Details

* House Location: <https://maps.app.goo.gl/mtf6nRYb8rqiT2hx8>
* Time to ETH ~40 Minutes
* Travel individually, no fixed travel times. You need to buy a ticket if you need it.

### The fine print

* By participating you agree that pictures and videos can be taken of you that could be used for VIS-Purposes (VISIONEN, Instagram, etc)
* By participating, you agree to adhere by the [VIS Code of Conduct](https://cdn.vis.ethz.ch/code-of-conduct)
* Every participant is responsible for their own insurance
* All statements are made without guarantee
* In general, there are no refunds

| Cost VIS members | Cost non-VIS |
| --- | --- |
| 75.0 | 75.0 |

#### Event organisers

**Main event organiser** [Jonas Blank](mailto:blankj@ethz.ch)

##### Co-organisers

* [Fabian Emanuel Stuart Haecker](mailto:haeckerf@ethz.ch)
* [Aydin Suleman](mailto:asuleman@ethz.ch)
* [Noah Ackermann](mailto:nackermann@ethz.ch)

name: Heimwoche: Evening Pass
description:
Calm & Culture Events

## Note: This is only the evening pass for one/multiple evenings

## What is a "Heimwoche"?

The idea is that we rent a House relatively near ETH. In the evenings, dinner will be provided by VIS, along with an evening program that changes daily.
During the day, however, it is intended for you to go to ETH and go about your regular day, and only return for the evening. You will sleep in the house. So you don‚Äòt have to neglect your studies to join this event!

On this page you can buy tickets for single or multiple evenings.
This includes:

* the Dinner
* participation at the evening program

This does not include:

* overnight stay

If you want to be able to stay overnight, sign up for the other event [here](https://vis.ethz.ch/en/events/950/).

name: VIS x Accenture: Office Visit
description:

name: Bj√∂rnCTF 2025
description:
Fun & Action Events

Right during Halloween 2025, this year's edition of Bj√∂rnCTF will bring you a spooky CTF experience!

Have you ever wanted to try your hand at being a hacker? Then this is your chance! Bj√∂rnCTF will feature many different kinds of hacking challenges, from your usual challenges involving websites or binary applications, to onsite challenges involving lock picking and a treasure hunt. Rumours are, that you might even have to defeat a mysterious entity by collecting pages (in a game).

Bj√∂rnCTF is aimed both at experienced CTF players and beginners in the Infosec field, with challenges that span many difficulty levels, and all different traditional CTF categories (from pwn to reverse, web and crypto, and misc). Players will need to form teams of max 4 people and there will be prizes for the teams in the top 3 places.

If you want to learn more about what a CTF is and what you can expect, see the [CTF Handbook](https://ctf101.org).

For more information, please see our website: <https://bj√∂rnc.tf>.

## The fine print

* Insurance is the responsibility of the participants.
* By participating, you agree that pictures can be taken of you and used for VIS-purposes.
* All information provided may be subject to change.

### The fine print

* By participating you agree that pictures and videos can be taken of you that could be used for VIS-Purposes (VISIONEN, Instagram, etc)
* By participating, you agree to adhere by the [VIS Code of Conduct](https://cdn.vis.ethz.ch/code-of-conduct)
* Every participant is responsible for their own insurance
* All statements are made without guarantee
* In general, there are no refunds

name: Coding Weekend
description:
Workshops & Seminars

**IMPORTANT: Everyone will end up on the waitlist at first so that we have the opportunity to pick participants from all student associations. So even if the event is full, sign up!**

Have you ever said to yourself: "man why does VIS/VSETH/AMIV etc. not have this feature, they just need to..."
So now it is your turn to "just" sign up to Coding Weekend :D

You receive:

* cool weekend
* chill vibes
* food, drinks (feat. [Irrational Coffee](https://irrational.coffee) and their nice coffees), sleep (optional)
* warm fuzzy feelings of bonding with fellow coders

We receive:

* happiness of passing along knowledge

All for the low low low low cost of 5 francs :O

And before you worry about "I don't know anything, I wouldn't know what to do". No! this will be a strict (!!!) everyone is accepted and will be helped environment. No experience necessary. Just motivation :)

Further details will be communicated via mail :)

So come join us in Engelberg :)))

### The fine print

* By participating you agree that pictures and videos can be taken of you that could be used for VIS-Purposes (VISIONEN, Instagram, etc)
* By participating, you agree to adhere by the [VIS Code of Conduct](https://cdn.vis.ethz.ch/code-of-conduct)
* Every participant is responsible for their own insurance
* All statements are made without guarantee
* In general, there are no refunds

| Cost VIS members | Cost non-VIS |
| --- | --- |
| 5.0 | 5.0 |
